review: I like to Roku 3 much better than the Fire TV because it has many many many more channels BUT this is still a very good entertainment device.  So if you are mostly looking for a solution to watch your Amazon Prime content, HULU, NETFLIX, or SLING TV + playing visually entertaining games this is the device for you.  I love the voice search feature and the xbox like remote control for playing games.  The game video graphics are excellent.  The user interface is nicely designed.  It gets 5 starts for these reasons.On the other hand, If you want more content besides the ones I listed..... the ROKU has a massssssssive advantage on content over the Fire TV.  You get thousands of more channels.Either way, this is a good device.  The one you chose depends on what you are looking for.
author: Cesar Castro
